lead_paragraph: Arthur W. Buckel, 38, who escaped from a minimum-security satellite unit of Bayside State Prison, was apprehended in the woods off the Garden State Parkway.

headline.print_headline: Police Capture  Prison Escapee  in New Jersey  After a Week
headline.main: New Jersey Prison Escapee Is Captured

snippet: Arthur W. Buckel, 38, who escaped from a minimum-security satellite unit of Bayside State Prison, was apprehended in the woods off the Garden State Parkway.
abstract: New Jersey Police Officers capture escaped prisoner Arthur W Buckel, who was gone for nearly week, in woods off Garden State Parkway; Buckel was serving three-year sentence for aggravated assault and robbery in minimum-security satellite unit of Bayside State Prison.
